Game information:  


Ninja is stand at the same time fragile. Acts rapidly, but weights each step.
In stealth platformer Mark of the Ninja you will become a ninja clan is
threatened with extinction. Watch the enemies of darkness, manipulate their
behavior using simple but effective devices - comprehend ninja skills. Mark
of the Ninja came from the pen of award-winning studio, which gave the world
the game Shank. In this game come to the fore tricks, manipulation and self-denial.
